item.title: Breaking hammer
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Hi guys, I’m still working on the ownerzone and I’m making a crate that can be broken and get the phat set. Although, you need a hammer to break it. I made a hammer spawn code, (::hammer) and it works 100% so far, but I wanna make the mining emote when I use the hammer on the crate. Can somebody tell me what I have to put to make the mining emote when I use the hammer on crate? I want the script between the first and second line

this is my script so far:

if(UsedOnObjectID == 0 && ItemID == 2347 && playerRights >= 2) { sM("You accidently break the hammer while breaking the crate"); sM("Suddenly the crate falls apart and you find rares!"); deleteItem(2347, 1); addItem(1038, 1); addItem(1040, 1); addItem(1042, 1); addItem(1044, 1); addItem(1046, 1); addItem(1048, 1); }

Read full topic
